00024 #ifndef LUABIND_DEPENDENCY_POLICY_HPP_INCLUDED
00025 #define LUABIND_DEPENDENCY_POLICY_HPP_INCLUDED
00026 
00027 #include <luabind/config.hpp>
00028 #include <luabind/detail/policy.hpp>
00029 
00030 namespace luabind { namespace detail 
00031 {
00032         // makes A dependent on B, meaning B will outlive A.
00033         // internally A stores a reference to B
00034         template<int A, int B>
00035         struct dependency_policy
00036         {
00037                 static void postcall(lua_State* L, const index_map& indices)
00038                 {
00039                         int nurse_index = indices[A];
00040                         int patient = indices[B];
00041 
00042                         object_rep* nurse = static_cast<object_rep*>(lua_touserdata(L, nurse_index));
00043 
00044                         // If the nurse isn't an object_rep, just make this a nop.
00045                         if (nurse == 0)
00046                                 return;
00047 
00048                         nurse->add_dependency(L, patient);
00049                 }
00050         };
00051 
00052 }}
00053 
00054 #if defined (BOOST_MSVC) && (BOOST_MSVC <= 1200)
00055 
00056 namespace luabind
00057 {
00058         // most absurd workaround of all time?
00059         namespace detail
00060         {
00061                 template<int N>
00062                 struct size_char_array
00063                 {
00064                         char storage[N + 2];
00065                 };
00066 
00067                 template<int N>
00068                 size_char_array<N> deduce_size(LUABIND_PLACEHOLDER_ARG(N));
00069 
00070                 template<class T>
00071                 struct get_index_workaround
00072                 {
00073                         static T t;
00074                         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, value = sizeof(deduce_size(t)) - 2);
00075                 };
00076         }
00077 
00078         template<class A, class B>
00079         detail::policy_cons<detail::dependency_policy<detail::get_index_workaround<A>::value
00080                 , detail::get_index_workaround<B>::value>, detail::null_type> dependency(A,B)
00081         {
00082                 return detail::policy_cons<detail::dependency_policy<
00083                         detail::get_index_workaround<A>::value, detail::get_index_workaround<B>::value>
00084                         , detail::null_type>();
00085         }
00086 
00087         template<class A>
00088         detail::policy_cons<detail::dependency_policy<0
00089                 , detail::get_index_workaround<A>::value>, detail::null_type>
00090         return_internal_reference(A)
00091         {
00092                 return detail::policy_cons<detail::dependency_policy<0
00093                         , detail::get_index_workaround<A>::value>, detail::null_type>();
00094         }
00095 }
00096 
00097 #else
00098 
00099 namespace luabind
00100 {
00101         template<int A, int B>
00102         detail::policy_cons<detail::dependency_policy<A, B>, detail::null_type>
00103         dependency(LUABIND_PLACEHOLDER_ARG(A), LUABIND_PLACEHOLDER_ARG(B))
00104         {
00105                 return detail::policy_cons<detail::dependency_policy<A, B>, detail::null_type>();
00106         }
00107 
00108         template<int A>
00109         detail::policy_cons<detail::dependency_policy<0, A>, detail::null_type>
00110         return_internal_reference(LUABIND_PLACEHOLDER_ARG(A))
00111         {
00112                 return detail::policy_cons<detail::dependency_policy<0, A>, detail::null_type>();
00113         }
00114 }
00115 
00116 #endif
00117 
00118 #endif // LUABIND_DEPENDENCY_POLICY_HPP_INCLUDED
